name: HH_EPSD_AUTH_INFO
description: This table contains Home Health episode-level information entered in the Authorization Information table in the Financial and Authorization Information form in Intake.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUTHORIZATION_CMT
columns.description: Authorization comment text entered by a user.

columns.name: AUTH_BY_ID
columns.description: This column stores the identifier for the user who entered the authorization information.  The column links to the table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: AUTH_BY_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
